token.Na Stone, a regra é fazer diferente para: At Stone, the rule is to do things differently to solve challenges, build big things and impact the payments market, which is responsable for 17% of Brazilian GDP.
token.Somos uma fintech que vem crescendo em r: We are a fintech that has been growing at a strong pace and assuming large missions. With that, we are no longer a startup, we are becoming a great company.
token.Apesar de não sermos mais uma startup, s: Although we are not a startup anymore, we continue with our disruptive culture of innovation and risk-taking; and with our purpose to transform the way entrepreneurship is seen and done in our country.
token.Temos uma base forte de investidores e p: We have a strong base of investors and professionals with more than 16 years of experience at the payments market. In the last 2 years, we grew 15X our team, almost 1.500X our portofolio of clientes and __X our invoicing.
token.Os aprovados no Experienced Stone Progra: Those approved at the Experienced Stone Program will work 3 months in a specific project. During this time, they will receive follow-up from the directors and, at the end of the project, a leadership role based on personal interest and skills.
token.Com o grande crescimento e os desafios q: Along with the great growth and challenges we´ve faced, we seek above-average professionals to take part int the construction of our areas and support decision making.
token.Assim como os profissionais que buscamos: Just like the professionals we seek, we have exceptional people with international academic background, who
token.tem nos ajudado a construir um negócio g: are helping us build a great business of reference. Get to know a little bit of their stories:
token.A Stone é uma adquirente de cartão de cr: Stone is a 100% Brazilian credit card acquirer, with a disruptive approach to the market and innovative products in a segment dominated by big banks.
token.Oferecemos um pacote completo de serviço: We offer a full package of payments services to merchants so they can process their transactions and increase their conversion rates. All that within a smart, personal and specialized attendance.
